name: Eleven Rooms
description:
Louise Willis is a normal girl who finds herself in an abnormal situation; she's been kidnapped, and is now trapped in a strange facility! Now, she must try and escape by solving the myriad of puzzles placed throughout these eleven rooms, and maybe figure out why she was abducted in the first place.

This is my first attempt at making something in the RPG Maker engine. For this project, I focused on just making a basic adventure game without using the battle system or any additional bells or whistles. Eleven Rooms uses no external plugins, with the only modifications being a few altered graphics. After working on this off-and-on for about a month, it's finally in a state where I can call it "finished". I hope you enjoy!
